clauses.title: Definitions and Interpretation
clauses.text:
"OEM" shall mean the Original Equipment Manufacturer of the software or hardware product being supplied or resold by Softcell.
"EULA" shall mean the End User License Agreement issued by the respective OEM, governing the use of their proprietary software.

clauses.title: Scope of Work
clauses.text: To be added separately as part of Statement of Work.

clauses.title: Payment Terms
clauses.text:
All invoices shall be payable within thirty (30) days from the date of receipt. Disputes must be raised within seven (7) days of receipt.
Late payments attract a penalty of 2% per month.
In case of conflict, invoice terms shall prevail.

clauses.title: Service Levels
clauses.text:
As per the relevant SoW.
Softcell does not agree to penalties unless expressly accepted in writing.

clauses.title: Warranty Disclaimer
clauses.text: No warranties provided by Softcell for software or hardware. Any applicable warranties are offered directly by OEMs through their policies, including EULAs.

clauses.title: Intellectual Property
clauses.text:
IP rights remain with OEMs or licensors.
Softcell does not claim ownership over third-party IPs.

clauses.title: Indemnity
clauses.text:
Softcell does not provide indemnities for IPR of resold products.
Indemnities, if applicable, are provided by the respective OEMs.

clauses.title: Data Protection & Privacy
clauses.text:
Softcell complies with applicable data protection laws, including the DPDPA once enforced.
Softcell does not store or process personal data in its ordinary business.
Once effective, If data is processed, relevant legal provisions shall apply.

clauses.title: Confidentiality
clauses.text:
Parties must maintain confidentiality of shared information.
Confidentiality obligations survives for 3 years post termination.

clauses.title: Subcontracting
clauses.text: No subcontracting without written consent.

clauses.title: Assignment
clauses.text: No assignment without written consent, except to affiliates or during mergers/acquisitions.

clauses.title: Force Majeure
clauses.text: Except for customer's payment obligations, neither party is liable for delays caused by circumstances beyond reasonable control (e.g., acts of God, war, strikes, epidemics, governmental actions).

clauses.title: Limitation of Liability
clauses.text:
Softcell's total liability capped at 3% of fees paid in the relevant financial period.
Excludes liability for dishonesty, fraud, personal injury, or anything non-excludable by law.

clauses.title: Non-Solicitation
clauses.text:
This clause shall always be mutual.
No solicitation or hiring of the other party's employees for one year post-termination without written consent.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.text:
Agreement can be terminated with 30 day's prior written notice.
All services, including licenses, are non-cancellable and non-refundable, even post termination.

clauses.title: Audit Rights
clauses.text: No audit rights to customers, unless required by regulators or under applicable regulations.

clauses.title: Governing Law & Jurisdiction
clauses.text: Indian law governs the Agreement. Courts in Mumbai have exclusive jurisdiction.

clauses.title: Notices
clauses.text: Defines how formal communications should be delivered (e.g., email, courier).

clauses.title: Severability
clauses.text: Invalid clauses don't affect the rest of the agreement.

clauses.title: Entire Agreement
clauses.text: Supersedes all prior agreements between the parties.

clauses.title: Amendment
clauses.text: Modifications must be in writing and signed by both parties.

clauses.title: Waiver
clauses.text: Failure to enforce a provision does not waive the right to enforce it later.

clauses.title: Relationship of Parties
clauses.text: Parties are independent contractors; no agency or partnership created.

clauses.title: Compliance with Laws
clauses.text: Each party must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

clauses.title: Export Control
clauses.text: Obligations around export laws (e.g., US EAR, ITAR).

clauses.title: Publicity
clauses.text: Restricts use of names/logos without written consent.

clauses.title: Non-Compete
clauses.text: Prohibits entering into competing agreements for a certain period.

clauses.title: Governing Language
clauses.text: Specifies the language of the contract in multilingual cases.

clauses.title: Survival
clauses.text: Lists provisions that survive termination (e.g., IP, confidentiality).

clauses.title: Taxes
clauses.text: Clarifies responsibility for taxes (e.g., GST, VAT).

clauses.title: Background Checks
clauses.text: Permits checks on personnel assigned to the project.

clauses.title: Insurance
clauses.text: Requires maintenance of specific insurance coverage levels.
